FuncDef:
The ipv4 vpn command creates and displays the BMP session IPv4 VPN view.
The undo ipv4 vpn command deletes the BMP session IPv4 VPN view. The ipv4 vpn command creates and displays the BMP session IPv4 VPN view. The undo ipv4 vpn command deletes the BMP session IPv4 VPN view. By default, the BMP session IPv4 VPN view does not exist.
ExtraInfo: To create and enter the BMP session IPv4 VPN view, run the ipv4 vpn command in the BMP session view.
